short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Abenity Perks extension searches the website you're browsing to help you find current, new, and limited time discount offers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Abenity's member-only perks and discounts offer savings on everything from pizza and the zoo to movie tickets, oil changes, car rentals, and hotels. 

And with the Abenity Perks extension for Chrome, you'll never miss a savings opportunity.

The Abenity Perks Chrome Extension will check for any discounts available to you and provide you with instructions for applying the discount to your shopping cart on any site you are browsing.

Abenity's Top Features Include:

PERK ALERTS
Get push notifications on your phone when you are within 1 mile of a nearby offer

LOCAL & NATIONAL DISCOUNTS
With thousands of local and national discounts across 10,000 cities, you'll never be far from savings!

NEARBY OFFERS
Discover offers within 10 miles of your current location using geo-aware technology.

MOBILE COUPONS
Show & save mobile coupons provide instant in-store discounts at nearby restaurants and retailers.

MOVIE SHOWTIMES & TRAILERS
Conveniently plan your next movie night with integrated showtimes and digital eTickets on demand.

ABENITY STORE
Save up to 40% at over 300 popular theme parks and attractions with no hidden fees and eTickets on-demand.

----------------------
About Abenity
----------------------

Abenity was founded in 2006 on the belief that perks should be easy to access, transparent, and simple to use.

With a focus on local offers, mobile redemptions, and no hidden ticketing fees, Abenity has quickly become a leading provider of branded perks and rewards programs for employers, national associations, and alumni groups of all sizes.

SIGN UP YOUR ORGANIZATION
If you are interested in setting up Abenity for your group, please request a demo at https://abenity.com
